A call and patern for true and speedy repentance being an abridgment of those many severe sermons by Thomas Reeve ... intituled God's plea for Nineveh. Reeve, Thomas, 1594-1672.
[12], 74, [8] p.
Printed for Th. Dawks, London : 1683.
At head of title: London's remembrancer. Erratas on p. [12] and p. [8] at end. Imperfect: pages torn with loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
